SELECT
c.*,
u.car_num,
u.phone,
s.user_no
FROM
call c
JOIN
match m ON c.call_no = m.call_no
JOIN
users u ON m.driver_no = u.user_no
LEFT JOIN
shares s ON c.call_no = s.call_no
WHERE
c.call_no = #{callNo}

SELECT u.*
FROM users u
JOIN match m ON u.user_no = m.driver_no
JOIN call c ON m.call_no = c.call_no
WHERE c.call_no = #{callNo}

SELECT *
FROM shares s
JOIN call c ON s.call_no = c.call_no
WHERE c.call_no = #{callNo}

SELECT u.*
FROM call c
JOIN match m ON c.call_no = m.call_no
JOIN users u ON m.passenger_no = u.user_no
WHERE c.call_no = #{callNo}

SELECT m.passenger_no
FROM call c
JOIN match m ON c.call_no = m.call_no
WHERE c.call_no = #{callNo}

SELECT s.*
FROM call c
LEFT JOIN shares s ON c.call_no = s.call_no
WHERE c.call_no = #{callNo}

SELECT bl.passenger_no
FROM call c
JOIN match m ON c.call_no = m.call_no
LEFT JOIN blacklist bl ON m.driver_no = bl.driver_no AND m.passenger_no = bl.passenger_no
WHERE c.call_no = #{callNo}

SELECT
c.*,
m.passenger_no,
u.phone AS passenger_phone,
s.user_no,
bl.blacklist_no
FROM
call c
JOIN
match m ON c.call_no = m.call_no
JOIN
users u ON m.passenger_no = u.user_no
LEFT JOIN
shares s ON c.call_no = s.call_no
LEFT JOIN
blacklist bl ON m.driver_no = bl.driver_no AND m.passenger_no = bl.passenger_no
WHERE
c.call_no = #{callNo}
